story.book.controller

Class FragmentCreationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • story.book.controller.LocalEditingController
      • story.book.controller.FragmentCreationController

  • public class FragmentCreationController
extends LocalEditingController
    Controller responsible for adding and removing Illustration objects of a StoryFragment object for the StoryFragmentEditActivity.
    Author:
    Alexander Cheung
    See Also:
    Illustration, TextIllustration, StoryFragment, LocalEditingController

      • saveAnnotations

        public void saveAnnotations( i,
                   java.lang.String cap)
        saveAnnotation() saves newly added annotation objects by assigning a caption from its view and adding it to the storyFragment by calling addAnnotation(Annotation annotation)
        Parameters:
        Pair - data structure which contains an ArrayList of the annotation's views (Author tag/media/caption), and the Annotation object itself
        String - caption to be set in the annotation
